channel.title: A new build im about ready to buy
channel.description:
Alright here is the specs
Gigabyte GA-EP45-UD3R http://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=N82E16813128359&Tpk=gigabyte%20ga-ep45-ud3r Intel Core2 Quad Q9400 http://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=N82E16819115131&Tpk=Intel%20Core2%20Quad%20Q9400 G Skill 4GB (2x2GB) http://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=N82E16820231166 EVGA 01G P3-1155-TR Geforce GTS250 http://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=N82E16814130469&Tpk=EVGA%2001G%20P3-1155-TR%20Geforce%20GTS250 Western Digital Caviar Black 500GB http://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=N82E16822136320&Tpk=Western%20Digital%20Caviar%20Black%20500GB Ultra X3 ULT40073 600-Watt Power Supply http://www.tigerdirect.com/applications/SearchTools/item-details.asp?EdpNo=2974472&CatId=106
Still picking out a case and a heatsink but currently what do you think?
The total so far is $684.94

item.title: A new build im about ready to buy
item.dc:creator: @whothe0 the fu superior
item.description:
@whothe0 wrote:

[quote=“xeez`, post:11, topic:293982”][quote author=mwiebelhaus link=topic=388920.msg2907504#msg2907504 date=1249877364]

That case is ugly

Opinions from someone who knows what they fuck they are taking about only please.
[/quote]Judging by your inability to use proper grammar, I’d say you are excluded from giving opinions, as well.
Actually, the case is quite ugly; it’s just too simple, in my opinion. Of course, I say this due to the fact that I like extravagating things.[/quote]
Shaddap xerxes.
Anyways, get a better graphics card, it shouldn’t cost too much more.

Read full topic
item.source: A new build im about ready to buy
